attributes.action: Ban Dangerous XL Bully Dog Owners Not The Breed
attributes.additional_details:
Any animal that is nurtured in the correct way will thrive but when a dog is not nurtured or is stimulated the wrong way things can go wrong! It’s like the saying monkey see monkey do! It is the owners  responsibility to have control an animal learns as to how you teach them nothing more nothing less!
 They are not born aggressive they are taught it.
 Xl bully’s are very misunderstood & it is unfair they are all painted with the same brush as the one who are owned by the dangerous owners! Ban The owners not the dogs!!
attributes.background: Before buying a dog owners should be vetted by the breeders & other local authority’s put a license scheme in place which people need to hold to be able to own such dogs! It is not the breeds that are dangerous it is the owners!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar actions:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Introduce screening process for dog owners:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643631

Bring back a Dog Licence:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643650
